1.0.name: wordpress/facebook-panel
1.0.description:
The Facebook Panel plugin sticks a Facebook icon to the left edge of the window, across every page of the site. When the icon is clicked, a panel comes sliding in featuring the official Facebook Like and Share buttons and Comments widget.

Currently, the following customization options are available: 1. Site owners can activate/deactivate the plugin from within the options page 2. Site owners can adjust the width of the panel 3. Site owners can choose between two modes: (a) "OVER" --> the panel slides in from the left, overlying the page. (b) "UNDER" --> the page slides out to the right, revealing the panel underneath.

Further options are planned for later releases.
